alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Traverse County through 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dumont, or 10 miles east of Wheaton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Traverse County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
